item.title: The Religious system of the Amazulu
item.scopeAndContent: [Source - Benathi Marufu for FHYA, 2020: A digital copy of the book The Religious System of the Amazulu. In the Zulu language with translation into english and notes in four parts: by Henry Callaway. Original printed by: Springdale mission press. Facsimile reprint. Cape town. C. Struik (PTY) LTD, 1970.]
